examples.example: 今晚我要和朋友一起去看一场精彩的电影。

translate.english: Tonight I will go to see a wonderful movie with my friends.

examples.example: 我喜欢在闲暇时光看电影来放松自己。

translate.english: I like to watch movies in my spare time to relax myself.

examples.example: 我和家人经常在周末一起看电影，享受温馨的家庭时光。

translate.english: My family and I often watch movies together on weekends and enjoy the warm family time.
